website.title: Website Development
website.description: We design and build responsive, user-friendly websites that reflect your brand and drive engagement. From landing pages to full corporate sites, we ensure performance, accessibility, and modern design standards.

webapp.title: Web App Development
webapp.description: Our team develops robust and scalable web applications tailored to your business needs. Using modern frameworks and best practices, we create secure, high-performance solutions for everything from dashboards to complex SaaS platforms.

mobile.title: Mobile Development
mobile.description: We build cross-platform and native mobile apps that deliver smooth user experiences on both iOS and Android. Whether for internal use or public release, we turn your ideas into powerful, intuitive mobile solutions.

training.title: Training
training.description: We provide hands-on, real-world IT training tailored to teams and individuals. Covering topics from web and mobile development to system administration and security, our programs empower learners to build practical, job-ready skills.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Founded last year, Kreatale began with a simple mission: to help businesses realize their dreams through innovative technology solutions. What started as a small team of passionate developers has quickly grown into a dynamic digital agency serving clients worldwide.
story.description1: We understand that behind every business idea lies a dream - a vision of what could be. Our mission is to bridge the gap between imagination and implementation.
story.description2: Through cutting-edge technology and creative problem-solving, we transform your business dreams into powerful digital solutions that drive real results.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.description: These principles guide everything we do, from how we approach projects to how we build relationships with our clients.

innovation.title: Innovation

collaboration.title: Collaboration

integrity.title: Integrity

dreams.title: Realizing Dreams Through Technology
dreams.description: At Kreatale, we believe every business has a dream. Whether it's launching a new product, expanding to new markets, or revolutionizing an industry, we're here to turn those dreams into digital reality.
dreams.description1: We understand that behind every business idea lies a dream - a vision of what could be. Our mission is to bridge the gap between imagination and implementation.
dreams.description2: Through cutting-edge technology and creative problem-solving, we transform your business dreams into powerful digital solutions that drive real results.
dreams.description3: Every project we undertake is more than just code - it's a step toward realizing your business dreams and achieving your goals.
dreams.cardDescription: We don't just build websites and apps - we build the digital foundation that makes your business dreams come true.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: FAQ
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our services and processes.

questions.question: What services does Kreatale offer?
questions.answer: We specialize in web development, mobile app development, custom web applications, WordPress customization, and UI/UX design. We create fast, modern, and scalable digital solutions tailored to your business needs.

questions.question: How long does it take to complete a project?
questions.answer: Project timelines vary depending on complexity. A simple website typically takes 2-4 weeks, while complex web applications can take 2-6 months. We'll provide a detailed timeline during our initial consultation.

questions.question: What is your development process?
questions.answer: Our process includes discovery & planning, design & prototyping, development & testing, and deployment & maintenance. We maintain clear communication throughout each phase and provide regular updates.

questions.question: Do you provide ongoing support after launch?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer various support packages including maintenance, updates, security monitoring, and performance optimization. We can also provide training for your team to manage the website.

questions.question: What technologies do you use?
questions.answer: We use modern technologies including Next.js, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and other cutting-edge tools. We choose the best technology stack based on your project requirements and goals.

questions.question: Can you work with existing websites?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We can redesign, rebuild, or enhance existing websites. We'll analyze your current site and recommend improvements to enhance performance, user experience, and conversion rates.

questions.question: How do you handle project communication?
questions.answer: We use project management tools, regular video calls, and detailed progress reports. You'll have a dedicated project manager and direct access to our development team throughout the project.

questions.question: What makes Kreatale different from other agencies?
questions.answer: We focus on creating high-performance, scalable solutions with clean code and modern design. Our team combines technical expertise with business understanding to deliver solutions that drive real results.

questions.question: Do you provide hosting and domain services?
questions.answer: Yes, we can help with hosting setup, domain registration, SSL certificates, and ongoing server management. We recommend reliable hosting providers that ensure optimal performance.

questions.question: How do you ensure website security?
questions.answer: We implement security best practices including HTTPS, secure authentication, regular updates, and security monitoring. We also provide security audits and recommendations for ongoing protection.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At Kreatale, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services.

information.title: Information We Collect
information.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:

items.name: Name and contact information
items.message: Messages and inquiries submitted through our contact form
items.usage: Information about how you use our website

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use the information we collect to:

items.process: Process and respond to your inquiries
items.communicate: Communicate with you about our services

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our website and hold certain information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information only with service providers who assist us in operating our website and conducting our business, subject to confidentiality agreements.

items.object: Object to processing of your information

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through our contact form or via WhatsApp.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Kreatale's website and services, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

services.title: Services
services.content: Kreatale provides web development, mobile app development, and digital solutions services. All services are provided subject to these Terms of Service.

obligations.title: Client Obligations
obligations.content: As a client, you agree to:

items.authorized: Ensure you are authorized to enter into agreements on behalf of your organization
items.comply: Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
items.responsible: Be responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of any credentials or access information provided

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: Upon full payment, you will own the final deliverables created specifically for you. Kreatale retains the right to use general knowledge, skills, and experience gained during the project.

payment.title: Payment Terms
payment.content: Payment terms will be specified in individual project agreements. All fees are due as agreed upon in the project contract.

delivery.title: Delivery and Timeline
delivery.content: We will make every effort to deliver projects within agreed timelines. However, delays may occur due to factors beyond our control, and we will communicate any delays promptly.

revisions.title: Revisions and Changes
revisions.content: Reasonable revisions are included in our service packages. Additional revisions beyond the agreed scope may incur additional charges.

warranty.title: Warranty
warranty.content: We warrant that our services will be performed in a professional and workmanlike manner. We will correct any defects in our work that are reported within 30 days of delivery.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Kreatale's liability is limited to the amount paid for the specific service. We are not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: Either party may terminate a project agreement with written notice. Upon termination, you will be responsible for payment for work completed up to the termination date.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. Continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us through our contact form or via WhatsApp.
